channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache James
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache James

item.title: CVE-2021-38542|2024-08-04T01:44:23.485Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20james
item.description: Apache James prior to release 3.6.1 is vulnerable to a buffering attack relying on the use of the STARTTLS command. This can result in Man-in -the-middle command injection attacks, leading potentially to leakage of sensible information.
